channel.title: Cult In The Jungle Republic Threeroll - Mafia Wins!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Cult in the Jungle Republic Threeroll!
This is a multiball setup where the mafia and the cult must compete against each other to win. Captain is my cohost~ ## Mechanics Were back to mostly the same ruleset from CITJR 2, but with three differences: • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority **and plurality**. There is no day one lynch, and day one ends when all players have confirmed. **No lynching is not an option.** • Both the mafia and the cult have a **day &** night chat. • Cultists win 1v1v1 scenarios, and equal numbered mafia and cult with no townies scenarios. • There are no wills/journals. • You can name your role if you want ### Night Actions Order • The **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** investigates their target, finding out if they are a member of **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** or not. • The night kill targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** become immune to being recruited by the cult. • A **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** attempts to recruit their target. It will only succeed if they are a **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** that is *not* the target of a night kill. • The targets of the **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** and/or **[color=red]The Mafia[/color]** are killed. ## Rolelist **[color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] x4** **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** **[color=lime]Cop[/color]** **[color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color] x12** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can't be recruited into the cult. **Factional Kill (Night)** - Each night phase, a mafia member may perform the factional kill. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when a majority of the living players are mafia, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=magenta]Cultist[/color] > **Recruit (Night)** - The Cult may recruit a player at night. You may only recruit citizens. If you recruit anyone else or a nightkill target, your recruit will fail. There can only ever be at most four cultists, including dead cultists. *You win when a majority of the living players are cultists, or when nothing can prevent this from happening.* > ## [color=lime]Cop[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Investigate (Night)** - Each night phase, you may investigate one player. You will get results back in the form of Mafia/Not Mafia (Cultists appear as Not Mafia). *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Anytime Vigilante[/color] > **Loyal (Passive)** - You can not be recruited into the cult. **Shoot (Day/Night)** - Once per day/night cycle, you may kill a player. A day/night cycle is determined by the number in Day or Night. For instance, Day 2 and Night 2 are in the same day/night cycle. Night 2 and Day 3 are in different day/night cycles. You can not kill a player on Day 1. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* # Player List: 1. Marcus - Cit 2. Sam17z - Died N2 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 3. Kai_5 - Lynched D3 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 4. BlueStorm - Lynched D2 - **[color=red]Pancake Patterson (Mafia Goon)[/color]** 5. Alice - Died N1 - **[color=magenta]Cultist[/color]** 6. Firekitten - Died N1 - **[color=#FF0000]T[/color][color=#FF3400]h[/color][color=#FF6900]e[/color] [color=#FFD300]0[/color] [color=#C1FF00]S[/color][color=#8CFF00]h[/color][color=#57FF00]o[/color][color=#23FF00]t[/color] [color=#00FF46]P[/color][color=#00FF7B]a[/color][color=#00FFAF]r[/color][color=#00FFE4]a[/color][color=#00E4FF]n[/color][color=#00AFFF]o[/color][color=#007BFF]i[/color][color=#0046FF]d[/color] [color=#2300FF]G[/color][color=#5700FF]u[/color][color=#8C00FF]n[/color] [color=#F600FF]O[/color][color=#FF00D3]w[/color][color=#FF009E]n[/color][color=#FF0069]e[/color][color=#FF0034]r[/color] [color=lime] (Citizen)[/color]** 7. Luxy - Shot D2 - **[color=red]Robbie Rotten (Mafia Goon)[/color]** 8. MaximusPrime - Cit 9. Twi1light - Mafia Goon 10. Geyde - Died N5 - **[color=lime]Executioner (Cop)[/color]** 11. Wolfy- Shot D4 - **[color=red]Furry (Mafia Goon)[/color]** 12. Shurian - Shot D6 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 13. Mathblade - Shot D3 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 14. Marluxion - Died N3 - **[color=lime]Not the Vigilante, noobs (Citizen)[/color]** 15. Blizer - Shot D5 - **[color=lime] Town, you guys are h*cking idiots (Citizen)[/color]** 16. overthebin - Cit 17. Livicus - Lynched D5 - **[color=lime]Scum (Citizen)[/color]** 18. bazingaboy - Lynched D4 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 19. hjasik - Died N5 - **[color=lime]Mafia Goon (Cultist) (Citizen)[/color]** # Spectators: 1. Boss110 2. GamerPoke 3. AnonymousUsual 4. Nerbins 5. ChibiBear 6. Meteoro # Backups: 1. Mercenary # Blacklist: Margaret, PKR.

item.dc:creator: overthebin
item.description:
On another topic

Hit & Miss (Anytime Vigilante)

Loyal (Passive) - You can not be recruited into the cult.
Shoot (Day/Night) - Once per day/night cycle, you may kill a player. A day/night cycle is determined by the number in Day or Night. For instance, Day 2 and Night 2 are in the same day/night cycle. Night 2 and Day 3 are in different day/night cycles. You can not kill a player on Day 1. The player you target is immune to being recruited by the cult.
You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.

Might as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Cult In The Jungle Republic Threeroll - Mafia Wins!
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
That was the worst game I have ever played as scum due to me being busy with assignments. I had barely time to actually read and play properly because it was sprung on me. But I really deserved that. Hopefully my uni will be slightly nicer and not throw and assingment with no notice to us.

However, I have got to admit, in all inpossible odds, Tw1 actually got this far and I’m really impressed. Her scum games are on point

Read full topic
